name: Phantasy star 3 2K RPG Maker (10th anniversary)
description:
Phantasy star 3 2K RPG Maker (10th anniversary)

A remake of the First Generation of the underappreciated Genesis RPG, Phantasy Star III, this version contains an expanded storyline and gameplay systems.

Plans to update graphics, music and import to new RPG Maker VX
